Package com.magictactil.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddFriendActivity
    Activity for friend adding
    CardAddActivity
    Activity for adding cards in deck
    CardAddActivity.AddCardTask
    AsyncTask for adding card in the deck on the server
    DeckActivity
    Deck activity : list the deck's card and a link to cards adding
    DeckActivity.GetCardsTask
    Qsync task for getting the deck's cards from the server
    DeckCreateActivity
    Activity for deck creation
    DeckCreateActivity.CreateDeckTask
    Async task for deck creation on the server
    EditProfilActivity
    Activity for edit profile and change password
    EndGameActivity
    Activity for the end of the game, tell the player he lost or won.
    EventActivity
    Single event activity which describe the event and permit to subscribe to it
    FriendActivity
    Friend activity showing a particular friend and permit to remove him from the player's friend list
    GameActivity  
    GameActivity.DLTask
    Async task for downloading images
    LoginTab
    Login activity containing a sign in fragment and a sign up fragment
    MenuTab
    Main connected activity containing 5 fragments: Profile Friends Events Decks Rooms
    NewEventActivity
    Activity for event creation
    RoomActivity
    Room main activity which list he players in the rooms, permit to join this room and to launch the game
    RoomActivity.PrepareGameTask
    Async task for downloading the cards images before the game
    RoomActivity.RoomDeleteTask
    Async task for deleting a room
    RoomActivity.RoomGetPlayersTask
    Async task for getting the players in the room
    RoomActivity.RoomJoinTask
    Async task for joining a room
    RoomCreateActivity
    Activity for room creation
    RoomCreateActivity.RoomCreateTask
    Async task for room creation
    SocialActivity
    Activity for friend chatting
